general_advisory: The district is likely to receive light rainfall with clear to overcast sky. The wind speed will remain within 5.0 to 8.0 kmph up to next five days. The daily maximum temperature may range between 30.0째C to 32.0째C. The minimum temperature may rise between 13.0째C to 16.0째C. Relative humidity during morning may range between 30 to 59 percent and that during the afternoon may range between 17 to 23 percent. Harvestable produce should be harvested and marketed to avoid deterioration of quality due to chances of occurrence of rain.

advisory: Farmers going for transplanting should apply 35 kg DAP, 30 kg MOP, and 8 kg Urea per acre during last puddling.
Chemically spray Metalaxyl-M 31.8% ES or Metalaxyl M 4% + Mancozeb 64% WP to manage Downy Mildew.
To manage aphids and thrips, spray Neem Based Pesticide 300 PPM.
Install light traps per acre to manage Dimond Back Moth infestation.
Collect and destroy affected fruits and larvae to control fruit borer.
To control Mango Hoppers, spray Imidacloprid or Thiamethoxam.
To control Alternaria leaf spot disease, spray Mancozeb or carbendazim.
To manage purple blotch and Stemphylium leaf blight, spray Mancozeb or Difenoconazole.
To control cut worm, spray Chlorpyriphos + Cypermethrin.
To control aphids and thrips, spray neem-based pesticide 1500 PPM.
Remove affected terminal shoots and fruits to manage brinjal shoot and fruit borer.
